    com.google.gwt.user.client.ui
    Widgets, Panels, and other user-interface classes.

      Methods in com.google.gwt.user.client.ui with parameters of type DisclosureHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ListenerWrapper.WrappedOldDisclosureHandler.add(DisclosurePanel source, DisclosureHandler listener) 
      void DisclosurePanel.addEventHandler(DisclosureHandler handler)
      Deprecated. 
      Use DisclosurePanel.addOpenHandler(OpenHandler) and DisclosurePanel.addCloseHandler(CloseHandler) instead
      void FiresDisclosureEvents.addEventHandler(DisclosureHandler handler)
      Deprecated. 
      Add an open or close handler to the event source instead
      static void ListenerWrapper.WrappedOldDisclosureHandler.remove(Widget eventSource, DisclosureHandler listener) 
      void DisclosurePanel.removeEventHandler(DisclosureHandler handler)
      Deprecated. 
      Use the HandlerRegistration.removeHandler() method on the object returned by an add*Handler method instead
      void FiresDisclosureEvents.removeEventHandler(DisclosureHandler handler)
      Deprecated. 
      Use the HandlerRegistration.removeHandler() method on the object returned by an add*Handler method instead
